data.title: Recent Publications at the University of Leicester – PVG Global
data.text:
The following publications involving authors from the University of Leicester have been captured over the last month. This list is updated on the first day of each month.

The following recent publications were downloaded on 1 May 2021 by the DevPubMetric system using data captured by the Scopus database over the preceeding month.

There are 21210 publications listed below.
